content: this is the ad-free easy to print pdf version of this pattern you can find the free pattern on my blog https //theturtletrunk com/farmhouse-placemat-crochet-pattern/ the farmhouse placemat is an easy crochet placemat pattern perfect for gifting selling or using in your own home it features a beautiful texture and border using easy crochet stitches make in any number of colors and easily adjust the size pattern includes -detailed instructions for a crochet placemat -link to free video tutorial -gauge difficulty advanced beginner supplies needed 221 yards of medium 4 weight cotton yarn 5 00mm h hook yarn needle and scissors standard us crochet terms you are more than welcome to sell your finished items but please give the turtle trunk credit as pattern designer my patterns including all photographs are copyrighted you may not copy re-distribute or sell my pattern
